Entry.JapaneseText: トーマとの戦いの時、<Hilda>さんの体から 発せられたあの光って、何だったんでしょうか？
Entry.EnglishText: What was that light that radiated from your body when we were fighting against Tohma?

Entry.JapaneseText: お母さんの事を考えたら 急に体中が熱くなって……
Entry.EnglishText: When I thought about what happened to my mother, I felt my entire body heat up suddenly...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Hilda>さんの中に、何か強い力が 眠っているのかもしれませんね……
Entry.EnglishText: ...I guess there must be some incredible power that was lying dormant within you.
